name: Luo Bo's Adventure
description:
Luo Bo returns to her hometown in hopes to open her own restaurant. She decides to learn local recipes from her grandma, Ah Ma.  Ah Ma gives Luo Bo her old notebook but realises her recipes are missing! She entrusts Luo Bo to go on a mission to find her missing recipes. Luo Bo embarks on a journey to find ingredients and master the local dishes. 

WHAT IS THIS GAME?

Luo Bo's Adventure is an open-world, slice of life game where you get to enjoy a free-roaming experience. This project is designed to introduce and pay tribute to some of Singapore’s local delights through gameplay and simultaneously explore ways to create an immersive gameplay with simple game controls.

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow keys  ---- Move

Left Mouse ---- Click

E ---- Pick up items

T ---- Chat with NPC

C ---- Cook at stoves

EXPLORE THE ISLAND

Complete tasks as you explore the island! Discover some of the Singapore's local dishes.

  • Find the missing recipes
  • Collect ingredients that would allow you to cook your dishes
  • Find treasure chests scattered around the island
  • Talk to friendly locals! Conversations may help you in your quests
  • Get your very own chef's jacket
  • Visit the market to buy your groceries
  • Explore Chinatown, Kampong Glam and Little India
  • Travel to neighbouring islands via the cable cars or river cruise!
